name: Warriors Gambit
description:
Warriors Gambit is a game in which you can control your luck by modifying dice.

Explore many synergies in a top-down shooter game where your only goal is to survive as many rounds as possible.



Create your own dice at the start of each round, but beware changing a side affects both your and enemy's die
